article_title: BRIEF-Compagnie Financiere Tradition and Ueda Yagi Group announce new joint venture
article_text:
Nov 27 Compagnie Financiere Tradition SA

* Says Compagnie Financiere Tradition and Ueda Yagi Group announce a new joint venture to broke Japanese derivatives Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
